name: Fury Strike
description: Fury Strike is an 80s-themed 2.5D cel-shaded fighter game created by Full Sail University students in collaboration with Rooster Teeth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 480, GTX 570, GTX 670, or better Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
